item.title: FTD Feature Limitations
item.author: Author
item.description: Since I see this topic coming up every now and then I thought it would be a good idea to create an overview of unsupported features for FTD in comparison to ASA.

item.title: AnyConnect for FTD
item.author: Author
item.description: AnyConnect has been a high priority roadmap item for Firepower Threat Defense and was planned to be released in version 6.2.1 with the new Firepower 2100 appliances in april. After some delays 6.2.1 was released on the 15th of May and firepower 2100 orders started shipping. So were are we standing at the moment? What platform support AnyConnect with FTD and what features are really working?
